definition: Maqu county in Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘南藏族自治州[Gan1 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu
Maqu county in Gannan Tibetan autonomous prefecture 甘南藏族自治州[Gan1 nan2 Zang4 zu2 zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Gansu

sentences.english: Maqu fault is the easternmost segment of the East Kunlun active fault.
sentences.chinese: 瑪曲斷裂位於東崑崙斷裂帶的最東段。

sentences.english: Maqu horse-racing is the essence of Maqu traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 瑪曲賽馬是瑪曲傳統文化中的精華。

sentences.english: Maqu horse-racing is the essence of Maqu traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 瑪曲賽馬是瑪曲傳統文化中的精華。

sentences.english: But in recent years, it faces a serious problem of environmental degradation.
sentences.chinese: 但近幾年來，瑪曲草原面臨着嚴重的退化問題。
